author: Matt Pomeroy
description: Almond-inspired (hence the orgeat) with hints of apple and lemon juice. For a more full-on almond-flavoured alternative perhaps try my own Almond Martini.
name: Almond Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
